abstract: Athanassios "Sakis" Prittas (Greek: Θανάσης Πρίττας; born 9 January 1979) is a Greek footballer who plays for Kavala F.C. in the Greek Football League, as midfielder.
comment: Athanassios "Sakis" Prittas (Greek: Θανάσης Πρίττας; born 9 January 1979) is a Greek footballer who plays for Kavala F.C. in the Greek Football League, as midfielder.
name: Athanassios Prittas
